tool.name: Supplement File
tool.description: Get supplement file given its name plus type or file path

param.name: supplement_type
param.label: Supplement Type
param.help: Type of parent data entity associated with the supplement

param.name: supplement_path
param.label: Supplement Path
param.help: Absolute file path of the supplement (inferred by AMP from name plus type)

data.name: supplement_file
data.label: Supplement File
data.help: A soft link pointing to the supplement path

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Get the supplement file by generating a soft link to its original file path inferred by AMP based on its name and type.
